abilities.name: Jamming
abilities.effect: After your opponent plays a Supporter card from his or her hand, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon. You can't use more than 1 Jamming Poké-Body each turn.

attacks.name: Cluster Bolt
attacks.effect: You may discard all Lightning Energy attached to Ampharos. If you do, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any Energy cards attached to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Waterlog
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach as many basic Water Energy cards from your hand to any of your Pokémon in any way you like. If you do, your turn ends. This power can't be used if Blastoise is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: Does 50 damage plus 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 40 damage in this way.

abilities.name: Fury Blaze
abilities.effect: If your opponent has 3 or less Prize cards left, each of Charizard's attacks does 50 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Blast Burn
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard. If tails, discard 4 Energy cards attached to Charizard. (If you can't, this attack does nothing.)

abilities.name: Burning Coat
abilities.effect: Whenever 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from Entei's attacks, discard the top 3 cards from your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Blaze Roar
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Entei.

abilities.name: Irritating Buzz
abilities.effect: As long as Flygon is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Active Pokémon between turns, excluding Fighting Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sand Sonic
attacks.effect: If you attach a Fighting Energy card from your hand to Flygon during this turn, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Sonic Blade
attacks.effect: Put damage counters on the Defending Pokémon until it is 50 HP away from being Knocked Out. If you do, your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psychic Cut
attacks.effect: You may choose as many of your face-down Prize cards as you like and put them face up. If you do, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage for each Prize card you chose. (These cards remain face up for the rest of the game.)

abilities.name: Telepass
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your opponent's discard pile for a Supporter card and use the effect of that card as the effect of this power. (The Supporter card remains in your opponent's discard pile.)  You can't use more than 1 Telepass Poké-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Gardevoir is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psychic Lock
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, your opponent can't use any Poké-Powers on his or her Pokémon.

abilities.name: Osmosis
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Gastrodon West Sea in play, you may move up to 3 damage counters from Gastrodon East Sea to 1 of your Gastrodon West Sea.

attacks.name: Dwindling Wave
attacks.effect: Does 80 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Gastrodon East Sea.

attacks.name: Raging Flood
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Gastrodon West Sea. Then, remove 2 damage counters from Gastrodon West Sea.

attacks.name: Wild Waves
attacks.effect: Put 1 damage counter on each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).

abilities.name: Phoenix Turn
abilities.effect: Once during your opponent's turn, if Ho-Oh would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, you may flip a coin. If heads, Ho-Oh isn't discarded. Instead, remove all damage counters, Special Conditions, and other effects from Ho-Oh. Then, discard all cards attached to Ho-Oh (except for Energy cards). This counts as Ho-Oh being Knocked Out and your opponent takes a Prize card.

attacks.name: Rainbow Wing
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage times the number of different types of basic Energy cards attached to Ho-Oh.

abilities.name: Cotton Spore
abilities.effect: Whenever Jumpluff would be damaged by your opponent's attack, flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Jumpluff by that attack.

attacks.name: Cottonweed Punch
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. For each heads, this attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Tongue Reel
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. If you choose a Benched Pokémon, switch the Defending Pokémon with that Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to the Pokémon you chose. Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Boundless Power
attacks.effect: During your next turn, Lickilicky can't attack.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.effect: At any time between turns, remove 1 damage counter from Ludicolo.

attacks.name: Nature Power
attacks.effect: If you have a Stadium card in play, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage. If your opponent has a Stadium card in play, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Silver Wing
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon and return it to your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Psychic Destruction
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has any Energy cards attached to it, this attack's base damage is 40 instead of 120.

attacks.name: Psychic Balance
attacks.effect: If you have less cards in your hand than your opponent, draw cards until you have the same number of cards as your opponent. (If you have more or the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does nothing.)

attacks.name: Re-creation
attacks.effect: Choose an attack on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon in his or her discard pile. Re-creation copies that attack except for its Energy cost. (You must still do anything else required for that attack.) Mew performs that attack.

abilities.name: Thunder Rumble
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you attach a Lightning Energy card from your hand to Raikou, you may put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunder Climb
attacks.effect: Discard 3 cards from the top of your deck. This attack does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each Lightning Energy card you discarded. Then, attach those Lightning Energy cards to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sleep Poison
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Magical Leaf
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage and remove 3 damage counters from Roserade.

attacks.name: Direct Hit
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dragon Finish
attacks.effect: Discard 2 basic Fire Energy cards or 2 basic Water Energy cards attached to Salamence. If you discarded 2 basic Fire Energy cards, this attack does 100 damage to the Defending Pokémon. If you discarded 2 basic Water Energy cards, this attack does 100 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (If you can't discard cards, this attack does nothing.)

abilities.name: Aqua Recovery
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Suicune from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your discard pile for up to 3 Water Pokémon, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.

attacks.name: Cure Stream
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Miracle Aroma
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, choose either Asleep, Burned, or Poisoned. The Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition. This power can't be used if Venusaur is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Giant Bloom
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 4 damage counters from Venusaur.

attacks.name: Baleful Wind
attacks.effect: Choose a card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it. If you discarded a Trainer, Supporter, or Stadium card, choose 1 more card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

attacks.name: Dark Raid
attacks.effect: If you played Absol from your hand during this turn, this attack's base damage is 40 instead of 10.

abilities.name: Flame Dash
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Arcanine from your hand to evolve 1 of your Benched Pokémon, you may switch Arcanine with 1 of your Active Pokémon. If you do, you may move any number of Energy cards attached to that Pokémon to Arcanine.

attacks.name: Inferno Onrush
attacks.effect: Arcanine does 40 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Ghost Head
attacks.effect: Put as many damage counters as you like on Banette. (You can't put more than Banette's remaining HP.) Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spiteful Pain
attacks.effect: If Banette is in your discard pile, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage. Then, search your discard pile for Banette, show it to your opponent, and shuffle it into your deck.

attacks.name: Dig Trap
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Dugtrio during your opponent's next turn. If Dugtrio is your Active Pokémon at the end of your opponent's next turn, put 6 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pit Trap
attacks.effect: Your opponent flips a coin. If tails, this attack does 50 damage plus 50 more damage.

abilities.name: Motor Drive
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Electivire. This power can't be used if Electivire is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Discharge
attacks.effect: Discard all Lightning Energy attached to Electivire. Flip a coin for each Lightning Energy you discarded. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Energy Shift
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if Electrode would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, you may use this power. Electrode isn't discarded. Instead, attach it as an Energy card to 1 of your Pokémon. While attached, this card is a Special Energy card and provides every type of Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time. (Has no effect other than providing Energy.)

attacks.name: Ion Blast
attacks.effect: You may do 40 damage plus 60 more damage. If you do, Electrode does 100 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Keen Eye
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Baton Pass
attacks.effect: You may switch Furret with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, move as many Energy cards attached to Furret as you like to the new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Encore
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can use only that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Break Beam
attacks.effect: You may do 40 damage plus 20 more damage. If you do, Golduck is now Confused.

attacks.name: Double Throw
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Megaton Rock
attacks.effect: You may do 40 damage instead of 80 to the Defending Pokémon. If you do, during your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Golem by attacks is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Icy Kiss
attacks.effect: If Jynx was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Lovely Kiss
attacks.effect: Move 2 damage counters from Jynx to the Defending Pokémon. If Smoochum is anywhere under Jynx, move 4 damage counters instead.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.effect: When you attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to Magmortar, remove 2 damage counters from Magmortar.

attacks.name: Flame Blast
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage times the number of Fire Energy attached to Magmortar.

attacks.name: Fireball Bazooka
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Minus Charge
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, you may draw 2 cards. You can't use more than 1 Minus Charge Poké-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Minun is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Tag Play (-)
attacks.effect: If you have Plusle on your Bench, you may move an Energy card attached to Minun to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Silver Wind
attacks.effect: During your next turn, if an attack does damage to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Raging Scales
attacks.effect: If Mothim has any damage counters on it, this attack does 30 damage plus 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Poison Rub
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Before doing damage, you may switch 1 of the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. The new Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Pride Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Nidoqueen on your Bench. This attack does 60 damage plus 30 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Mirror Move
attacks.effect: If Pidgeot was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does the same amount of damage done to Pidgeot to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Plus Charge
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, you may search your discard pile for up to 2 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. You can't use more than 1 Plus Charge Poké-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Plusle is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Tag Play (+)
attacks.effect: If you have Minun on your Bench, you may do 20 damage to any 1 Benched Pokémon instead. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.effect: If Sharpedo is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Sharpedo is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Strike Wound
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has 2 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

abilities.name: Grass Whistle
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from each of your Grass Pokémon. You can't use more than 1 Grass Whistle Poké-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Sunflora is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Petal Dance
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. If you get 2 or more heads, Sunflora is now Confused.

abilities.name: SET
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown S, Unown E, and Unown T on your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for an Energy card, show it your opponent, and put it on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Dark Engage
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Each of your Active Pokémon's type is Darkness until the end of your turn. If that Pokémon is no longer your Active Pokémon, this effect ends.

attacks.name: Shadow Charge
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Darkness Energy cards and attach them to any of your Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Chip Off
attacks.effect: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in his or her hand, discard a number of cards without looking until your opponent has 5 cards left in his or her hand.

abilities.name: Plant Cloak
abilities.effect: If Wormadam Plant Cloak has 2 or more Grass Energy attached to it, Wormadam Plant Cloak gets +40 HP.

attacks.name: Leaf Hurricane
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has fewer remaining HP than Wormadam Plant Cloak, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Sandy Cloak
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks, excluding damage, done to Wormadam Sandy Cloak.

attacks.name: Push Over
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Fighting Energy attached to Wormadam Sandy Cloak.

abilities.name: Trash Cloak
abilities.effect: If Wormadam Trash Cloak has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, any damage done to Wormadam Trash Cloak by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Iron Tackle
attacks.effect: Wormadam Trash Cloak does 20 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Psychic Shift
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if Xatu is on your Bench, you may choose 1 Special Condition from 1 of your Active Pokémon and remove that Special Condition. Then, 1 of the Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.

attacks.name: Energy Singe
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Drain Punch
attacks.effect: Remove from Breloom a number of damage counters equal to the amount of Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Homing Uppercut
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon's Retreat Cost is 0, this attack does 60 damage plus 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Flare Tail
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a Fire Energy attached to Charmeleon and this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Withdraw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Cloyster by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Spine Missile
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. For each heads, choose an opponent's Pokémon in play and this attack does 20 damage to those Pokémon. (You may choose the same Pokémon more than once.) (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Rapid Spin
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon, if any. You switch Donphan with 1 of your Benched Pokémon, if any.

attacks.name: Bash In
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 70 damage plus 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Swords Dance
attacks.effect: During your next turn, Farfetch'd's Leek Slap attack's base damage is 60.

attacks.name: Leek Slap
attacks.effect: During your next turn, Farfetch'd can't use Leek Slap.

attacks.name: Attract Current
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Electromagnetic Kick
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Flaaffy does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.effect: Remove 1 damage counter from Ivysaur.

abilities.name: Camouflage
abilities.effect: If any basic Energy card attached to Kecleon is the same type as the Attacking Pokémon's type, any damage done by attacks from that Pokémon to Kecleon is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Blind Scratch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does no damage to the Defending Pokémon. Instead, this attack does 20 damage to 1 of your Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Psychic Research
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a Supporter card and use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack. (The Supporter card remains in your discard pile.)

attacks.name: Telekinesis
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Torment
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't play any Supporter cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.

attacks.name: Absorb
attacks.effect: Remove 2 damage counters from Lombre.

attacks.name: Healing Milk
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, remove 3 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Continuous Tumble
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Toxic Sludge
abilities.effect: At the end of each player's turn, each of your opponent's Active Pokémon that has any Grass Energy attached to it is now Poisoned. If that Pokémon is already Poisoned, Toxic Sludge Poké-Body does nothing to that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Panic Liquid
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused and can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Spirited Drill
attacks.effect: During your next turn, each of Nidorino's attacks does 20 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Poison Horn
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Grip and Squeeze
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Power Guillotine
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack's base damage is 10 instead of 100.

abilities.name: Aqua Healing
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Quagsire is your Active Pokémon and the Defending Pokémon has any Water Energy attached to it, you may remove 3 damage counters from Quagsire.

attacks.name: Muddy Water
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Gnaw Off
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Sucker Punch
attacks.effect: If Raticate has any Darkness Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Sleep Powder
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Rummage
attacks.effect: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose as many Trainer cards as you like, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Put the other cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Shadow Sneak
attacks.effect: If you and your opponent have a different number of Prize cards left, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Focus Energy
attacks.effect: During your next turn, Shelgon's Protect Charge attack's base damage is 80.

attacks.name: Protect Charge
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Shelgon by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Cotton Balloon
abilities.effect: If Skiploom has any Grass Energy attached to it, any damage done to Skiploom by attacks from your opponent's Evolved Pokémon is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: U-turn
attacks.effect: Switch Skiploom with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Color Pick
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Trace
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose an attack on 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. Trace copies that attack except for its Energy cost. (You must still do anything else required for that attack.) Smeargle performs that attack.

abilities.name: Baby Evolution
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Jynx from your hand onto Smoochum (this counts as evolving Smoochum) and remove all damage counters from Smoochum.

attacks.name: Psykiss
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a Special Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon and have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

abilities.name: KIND
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 2 damage counters from 1 of the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: NOD
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown N, Unown O, and Unown D on your Bench, you may ask your opponent to take a Prize card. If he or she does, you take a Prize card. If he or she doesn't, draw a card.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

abilities.name: ONE
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown O, Unown N, and Unown E on your Bench and you have 1 card left in your hand, you may draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: X-RAY
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown X on your Bench, you may look at the top card of your opponent's deck and put it back on top of his or her deck.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: ZERO
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Unown Z is on your Bench and you have no cards in your deck, you may discard all cards attached to Unown Z and put Unown Z on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Remove as many damage counters as you like from each Unown you have in play. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Dangerous Scales
abilities.effect: If Venomoth is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Venomoth is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Disturbance Dive
attacks.effect: Prevent all effects of an attack, excluding damage, done to Venomoth during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Sand Wind
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Giant Wave
attacks.effect: Wartortle can't use Giant Wave during your next turn.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Bagon.

attacks.name: Shake Vine
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Bullet Seed
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Wear Cloak
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Burmy Plant Cloak is your Active Pokémon, you may search your discard pile for a basic Grass Energy card and attach it to Burmy Plant Cloak.

attacks.name: Plant Cloak Tackle
attacks.effect: If Burmy Plant Cloak has any Grass Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

abilities.name: Wear Cloak
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Burmy Sandy Cloak is your Active Pokémon, you may search your discard pile for a basic Fighting Energy card and attach it to Burmy Sandy Cloak.

attacks.name: Sandy Cloak Tackle
attacks.effect: If Burmy Sandy Cloak has any Fighting Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

abilities.name: Wear Cloak
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Burmy Trash Cloak is your Active Pokémon, you may search your discard pile for a basic Metal Energy card and attach it to Burmy Trash Cloak.

attacks.name: Trash Cloak Tackle
attacks.effect: If Burmy Trash Cloak has any Metal Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Bite Away
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

attacks.name: Lava Burn
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Double Slap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Rally
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 different types of Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Down Draw
attacks.effect: Draw a card from the bottom of your deck.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Electabuzz does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Gunky
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Roar
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Cottonweed
abilities.effect: If Hoppip has any Grass Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Hoppip is 0.

attacks.name: Hover Heal
attacks.effect: Remove all Special Conditions from Hoppip.

attacks.name: Lick
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Stomp
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Water Sport
attacks.effect: If Lotad has less Energy attached to it than the Defending Pokémon, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Smog
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bothering Wave
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Future Sight
attacks.effect: Look at the top 5 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Poison Skin
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Flail
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Phanpy.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.effect: Phanpy does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Growl
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Delusion
attacks.effect: If Psyduck is Confused, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Migraine
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If tails, Psyduck is now Confused.

abilities.name: Balloon Sting
abilities.effect: Once during your opponent's turn, if Qwilfish is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an attack (even if Qwilfish is Knocked Out), you may flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Nerve Shot
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Tail Whip
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Grope
attacks.effect: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the other card on the bottom of your deck.

attacks.name: Shell Rest
attacks.effect: Remove 2 damage counters from Shellder.

attacks.name: Shell Hunting
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 in any combination of Shellos West Sea and Shellos East Sea and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Recover
attacks.effect: Discard a Water Energy attached to Shellos West Sea and remove all damage counters from Shellos West Sea.

attacks.name: Toxic Spore
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

abilities.name: Pot Shell
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Shuckle by your opponent's Pokémon that has any Special Energy cards attached to it.

attacks.name: Ferment Poison
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. As long as the Defending Pokémon remains Poisoned by this attack, it can't use any Poké-Body.

attacks.name: Gossip
attacks.effect: Put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dish Out
attacks.effect: Draw a card from the top and the bottom of your deck.

attacks.name: Synchro Punch
attacks.effect: If any basic Energy card attached to Spinda is the same type as any Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Aqua Tail
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Water Energy attached to Squirtle. This attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Lead
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Frighten Horn
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon isn't an Evolved Pokémon, that Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Sun Soak
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, remove all damage counters from Sunkern, search your deck for an Evolution card that evolves from Sunkern, and put it onto Sunkern. (This counts as evolving Sunkern.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Inviting Trap
attacks.effect: Switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sand Tomb
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Signal Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Big Explosion
attacks.effect: Voltorb does 50 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Yawn
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Splatter
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

abilities.name: Teleportation
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), choose 1 of your Active Pokémon or 1 of your Benched Pokémon and switch Gardevoir with that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Gardevoir is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Bring Down
attacks.effect: Choose 1 Pokémon (yours or your opponent's) with the fewest remaining HP (excluding Gardevoir) and that Pokémon is now Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Darkness Wing
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon would be Knocked Out by damage from this attack, you may search your discard pile for any 1 card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.
